attributes.action: Keep up Police numbers on our streets
attributes.additional_details:
Please reconsider cutting Police numbers, due to financial restraints, there is plenty of waste in other sections.  One of the main ares of waste is taking offenders into custody and then they are let off to go and offend again.

It is no good hoping Police Officers will work their day off when the chips are down, if they are too tired/stressed the quality of their work must be affected.
